price: 49. Baye bazali kobanga Nkolo wa bango ata soki bazali kornona ye te, mpe bazali kobanga eleko ya mokolo ya suka.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
